abilities.description: Your waterwyrm uses its scaly hide and dagger-like teeth to overcome threats. When you make a move by sending the waterwyrm to directly attack a foe or smash an obstacle, roll +its health.
When you make a move by directing your waterwyrm to entangle a foe or object in its long leviathan-like body, roll +its health and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Your waterwyrm is harnessed and trained as a mount for underwater travel. When you ride your waterwyrm as you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3ff03b51f620ab26]{Undertake an Expedition} underwater, roll +its health.
